instruction: Suggest a party theme based on the given movie title.
output: A Wizard of Oz themed party would be a great way to celebrate a special event! Decorations could include yellow brick roads, ruby slippers, a replica of the Emerald City, lions and tigers and bears, oh my! Guests could come dressed as their favorite characters, with plenty of Wizard of Oz-themed snacks and drinks for everyone to enjoy. There could even be a trivia game based around the movie.
